update ich_group set group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_create_time = #{groupCreateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, group_address = #{groupAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_x = #{addressX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_y = #{addressY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

from ich_group where 1=1
AND group_name like CONCAT('%',#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
